forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with areas of fog developing after midnight. Low near 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 57F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 53F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 50F. SSE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
